Question
========

One tests H~1~: p = 0.5 against H~2~: p = 0.3 in a random sample of n = 10 observations. Testing quantity is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. As the left critical limit, the value 4 is used. The discernment power 1 - Î² is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.65
* 0.85
* 0.95

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.65: Incorrect
* 0.85: Correct
* 0.95: Incorrect
